tweet.text: What was the U.S. #PublicDiplomacy strategy in South #Vietnam before the war? Read USIA’s memo to the White House https://t.co/xOyUk6P9m1 and https://t.co/uwIMEwNH6J #FRUS #twitterstorians
tweet.html: What was the U.S. #PublicDiplomacy strategy in South #Vietnam before the war? Read USIA’s memo to the White House go.usa.gov/xnXzq and go.usa.gov/xnXzx #FRUS #twitterstorians
